meta.name: description
meta.content: The mission of the Brea Olinda Unified School District, in partnership with home and community, is to provide all students a quality education that prepares and inspires them to strive for high goals, become responsible, contributing citizens, and continue learning all their lives. To do this, we seek daily to create a challenging, supportive learning environment in which all members of the educational community are respected, differences are valued, and excellence is expected.

li.a: Laurel Elementary Magnet School of Innovation & Career Exploration
Computer Science Immersion Program: Code to the Future

header.h2: BOUSD District Office and School Sites Closed to the Public - Extended Student Dismissal Period Through June 4, 2020

div.p: Please note that the student dismissal period has been extended through the end of the school year, June 4, 2020. Even though sites are closed to the public, we are still available to serve and meet the needs of our families and students. Please read the full story for contact information during our closure to the public.

h3.a: Preschool/TK & Kindergarten Registration Information and Important Dates!

div.div: Attention parents of children ages 3-5 who plan on attending school in the Brea Olinda Unified School District for the 2020-2021 school year! This information is for you!
